Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.controller

Class ClientController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.controller.ClientController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer, ViewObserver, LobbyMessageReader
public class ClientController extends Object implements ViewObserver, Observer, LobbyMessageReader
Controls the client reading and managing all not Play messages and forwarding them to the PlayMessageController class.
